name: Balatro Game Save File
summary: Learn about .JKR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: If you need to back up, transfer, or edit your save data, you will likely encounter the JKR file. For example, if you experience issues with your save file, you might need to restore it from a backup or edit it to correct certain settings.
Balantro creates JKR files in one of three folders (named 1, 2, or 3) to store save progress. For example, Balantro may create a JKR file in folder 1 in the following location:

instructions: JKR files are not meant to be opened. Instead, LocalThunk Balatro references the JKR files to load profile save data.
However, if you are looking to modify save data in a JKR file, you can upload it to Balatro Save Editor in a web browser.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
